ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] eq at work
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not very surprised they are. However, i have no problems playing eq at work but if i find out about any other employees doing it i m gonna get pissed =P
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not very surprised they are.

However, i have no problems playing eq at work but if i find out about any
other employees doing it i'm gonna get pissed =P

-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: Rob LeBeau [mailto:rlebeau65@...]

Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Ämne: Re: [EverQuest] eq at work


I am surpised your work has those ports on the routers
and firewalls open for traffic.....

Novice Network people.... :)
